title: The Innocents
description: And so it begins, the virus enters on the quiet feet of The Innocents.It invades each and every one of us.But, they say, plagues are like fires.At some point, they burn themselves out. Or not.FEAR AND RUMOR CAN BE FAR MORE DANGEROUS THAN THE VIRUS ITSELF.A new dystopian, post-apocalyptic fiction series from author Bobby Akart (The Blackout Series, The Boston Brahmin series and the Prepping for Tomorrow series). The events depicted in The Pandemic Series are fictional. They are, however, based upon historical fact.
author: Bobby Akart
